unnormalised: Okay, here's the generated blog post based on your specifications:
normalised: Finally booked that long awaited trip to Kerala! You know, the one I’ve been blabbering about since, like, forever? The planning stage itself felt like a mini adventure, especially figuring out the logistics and accommodations. Finding the perfect place, and deciphering addresses that sound straight out of a storybook? Quite the task, let me tell you.

unnormalised: Finally booked that long-awaited trip to Kerala! You know, the one I’ve been blabbering about since, like, forever? The planning stage itself felt like a mini-adventure, especially figuring out the logistics and accommodations. Finding the perfect place, and deciphering addresses that sound straight out of a storybook? Quite the task, let me tell you.
normalised: It all started with the allure of those backwaters. Picturesque houseboats, lush greenery… I-n-s-t-a-g-r-a-m made me do it. So, I began my search. My initial plan involved a cozy little homestay somewhere near Alleppey.

unnormalised: It all started with the allure of those backwaters. Picturesque houseboats, lush greenery… Instagram made me do it. So, I began my search. My initial plan involved a cozy little homestay somewhere near Alleppey.
normalised: The first listing I stumbled upon looked promising: “Green Valley Cottages, Near Punnamada Finishing Point, Alleppey, Kerala, six eight eight zero zero six.” Sounded idyllic. I envisioned myself sipping chai on the porch, overlooking the serene waters. I emailed them to inquire about availability during my planned dates, tenth November two thousand and twenty four to seventeenth November two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: The first listing I stumbled upon looked promising: “Green Valley Cottages, Near Punnamada Finishing Point, Alleppey, Kerala, 688006.” Sounded idyllic. I envisioned myself sipping chai on the porch, overlooking the serene waters. I emailed them to inquire about availability during my planned dates, 10/11/2024 to 17/11/2024.
normalised: Then, the address decoding began. “Near Punnamada Finishing Point”? Okay, G-o-o-g-l-e Maps to the rescue! Turns out, it's the venue for the famous Nehru Trophy Boat Race. Good to know! But then, another place caught my eye: "Serenity Backwaters, House Number twelve slash three four five, Ward seven, Kalarcode P-o, Alappuzha – six eight eight zero zero three".

unnormalised: Then, the address-decoding began. “Near Punnamada Finishing Point”? Okay, Google Maps to the rescue! Turns out, it's the venue for the famous Nehru Trophy Boat Race. Good to know! normalised: This one seemed a bit more secluded, exactly what I was looking for. The reviews raved about the authentic Kerala cuisine and the peaceful atmosphere. However, finding Kalarcode P-o on the map proved to be another challenge. Ward seven, House Number twelve slash three four five... it felt like I was solving a riddle.

normalised: Next, I considered a more luxurious option: a stay at the "Kumarakom Lake Resort, Kumarakom North P-o, Kottayam Dist., Kerala, P-I-N six eight six five six three". The photos were stunning, showcasing sprawling villas with private pools. But the price tag? Ouch.

unnormalised: Next, I considered a more luxurious option: a stay at the "Kumarakom Lake Resort, Kumarakom North P.O., Kottayam Dist., Kerala, PIN 686563". The photos were stunning, showcasing sprawling villas with private pools. But the price tag? Ouch.
normalised: While browsing, I also came across several mentions of homestays in Fort Kochi. One that stood out was "Rose Garden Homestay, two slash four five six, Princess Street, Fort Kochi, Ernakulam, Kerala - six eight two zero zero one". The vibrant street art and the historical charm of Fort Kochi appealed to my inner explorer. Plus, Princess Street sounded positively enchanting.

normalised: Ultimately, after hours of research and countless comparisons, I opted for a mid-range option in Munnar, known for its tea plantations. The address: "Green Hills Estate, Chinnakanal P-o, Idukki Dist., Kerala, six eight five six one eight". The reviews mentioned breathtaking views and a tranquil escape from the city bustle. Perfect!

normalised: Booking dot com confirmed my reservation. They sent all the details: confirmation number, booking dates, amount debited (rupees fifteen thousand). After confirming the address again I was satisfied.

normalised: So, Kerala, here I come! Get ready for some serious chai sipping, houseboat adventures, and hopefully, no more address related headaches! Now, if you’ll excuse me, I need to start packing my bags (and brushing up on my Malayalam phrases!).
